definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: That's such a beautiful dress. I'm tempted to use some of my mad money and buy it.
sentences.chinese: 那件衣服太漂亮了，我真想用一些私房錢買下它。

sentences.english: This is Madame de Rothschild's private room.
But all in a word, I firmly oppose saving cash dough.
sentences.chinese: 總之，我堅決反對存私房錢。

sentences.english: Later that month she used her play money to buy a piece of bumble gum.
sentences.chinese: 後來她用私房錢賬戶裏的錢買了一塊口香糖。

sentences.english: Recently, home-cooked meals has a popularity unnoticed in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 近來，私房菜開始在北京悄悄流行起來。

sentences.english: "Mad Money" great harm, must not be allowed to spread.
sentences.chinese: “私房錢”危害很大，絕不能任其滋生蔓延。

sentences.english: I save some egg money for the newest-PSP.
sentences.chinese: 我想買最新的遊戲機，所以存了點私房錢。

sentences.english: My wife and I each receive our own play money, and here’s the best part.
sentences.chinese: 太太和我都有自己的私房錢，這一點最好了。

sentences.english: Two people come up with their own money donated a hope primary school.
sentences.chinese: 兩人拿出自己的私房錢捐助了一所希望小學。

sentences.english: Maybe he will give you some surprise with his egg money.
sentences.chinese: 也許有天他會用私房錢給你個驚喜呢。

sentences.english: My father sometimes squirrels some money away before he gives his salary to my mom.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸有時會在將薪水交給我媽媽之前偷藏私房錢。

sentences.english: The number of tenants renting privately has increased by nearly one million in the past five years.
sentences.chinese: 在最近五年，租用私房的租戶人數增加了近百萬。

sentences.english: We would like to hear the candidates tell Americans how they will stand up for homeowners.
sentences.chinese: 我們更希望聽到的是，兩位候選人會替私房房主着想。

sentences.english: Recently, private home cuisine is becoming popular in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 近來，私房菜開始在北京悄悄流行起來。

sentences.english: What were you two whispering about that was so secret?
sentences.chinese: 你們兩個悄悄地在這兒講什麼私房話？

definition: Matou town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to keep hidden/to keep in one's private possession/secret store/stash
feet and legs in silk stockings (especially in the massage context)
to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
